languages.text: {n}Идира наклоняет голову набок, словно прислушиваясь к чему-то.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы меня извините, но только это как слепому про цвета рассказывать: могу часами говорить, а толку не будет".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира наклоняет голову набок, словно прислушиваясь к чему-то.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы меня извините, но только это как слепому про цвета рассказывать: могу часами говорить, а толку не будет".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира наклоняет голову набок, словно прислушиваясь к чему-то.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы меня извините, но только это как слепому про цвета рассказывать: могу часами говорить, а толку не будет".

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a blind person about colors — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉侧过了头，仿佛在仔细听着什么。{/n}“很抱歉，舰长大人，但这就像是和天生目不视物的人谈论颜色一样。我可以花几个小时和你解释，但这对你而言毫无意义。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉侧过了头，仿佛在仔细听着什么。{/n}“很抱歉，舰长大人，但这就像是和天生目不视物的人谈论颜色一样。我可以花几个小时和你解释，但这对你而言毫无意义。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

languages.text: {n}Idira ladea la cabeza, como si escuchara algo con atención.{/n} «Lord Capitán, disculpe, pero sería como hablar sobre el color con alguien que ha nacido ciego. Podría pasarme horas explicándolo, pero nunca le encontraría el sentido».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira ladea la cabeza, como si escuchara algo con atención.{/n} «Lord Capitán, disculpe, pero sería como hablar sobre el color con alguien que ha nacido ciego. Podría pasarme horas explicándolo, pero nunca le encontraría el sentido».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは何かに耳を澄ますように首を傾げる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、失礼だけど、それは生まれつき目が見えない人に色について話すようなものだわ。時間をかけて説明することはできるけど、理解はできないでしょうね」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは何かに耳を澄ますように首を傾げる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、失礼だけど、それは生まれつき目が見えない人に色について話すようなものだわ。時間をかけて説明することはできるけど、理解はできないでしょうね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira neigt den Kopf zu einer Seite, als würde sie aufmerksam auf etwas lauschen.{/n} "Lord Captain, vergebt mir, doch das wäre, wie mit einer blind geborenen Person über Farben zu sprechen. Ich könnte es stundenlang erklären, Ihr würdet es doch nicht begreifen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira neigt den Kopf zu einer Seite, als würde sie aufmerksam auf etwas lauschen.{/n} "Lord Captain, vergebt mir, doch das wäre, wie mit einer blind geborenen Person über Farben zu sprechen. Ich könnte es stundenlang erklären, Ihr würdet es doch nicht begreifen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira penche la tête d'un côté comme si elle tendait l'oreille.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais ce serait comme de parler des couleurs à un aveugle : j'aurai beau essayer de vous l'expliquer pendant des heures, vous ne pourrez jamais comprendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira penche la tête d'un côté comme si elle tendait l'oreille.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais ce serait comme de parler des couleurs à un aveugle : j'aurai beau essayer de vous l'expliquer pendant des heures, vous ne pourrez jamais comprendre. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, sanki bir şeyleri dikkatle dinlercesine başını yana eğiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, lütfen beni affet. Doğuştan kör birine renklerden bahseder gibi olacak. Saatlerce oturur açıklarım ama sana bir şey ifade etmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira tilts her head to one side as though listening closely to something.{/n} "Lord Captain, forgive me, but it would be like talking to a person born blind about colours — I could spend hours explaining, but it wouldn't make any sense to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, sanki bir şeyleri dikkatle dinlercesine başını yana eğiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, lütfen beni affet ama sanki doğuştan kör birine renklerden bahseder gibi olacak. Saatlerce otururum, açıklarım ama sana bir şey ifade etmez."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
